metadata.description: A globally unique name for the Function App to be created which will run the code to ingest DLP data into Sentinel.

Select to enable Application Insights for the Function App. This will allow you to monitor the status of the Function App for any errors. The Log Analytics Workspace specified in the "Log Analytics Resource Id" Parameter will be used to store the Application Insights data.
A globally unique name for the Key Vault to be created which will store Function App secrets.
A globally unique name for the Function App Storage Account. Must be between 3 and 24 characters in length and use numbers and lower-case letters only.
Azure AD tenant ID in which DLP instance resides.
App Registration Client ID.
App Registration Client secret.
Internal domain names for your organization to better determine the source of email messages.
Name for Data Collection Endpoint to be created which is used to ingest data into Log Analytics workspace.
Name for Data Collection Rule to be created which is used to ingest data into Log Analytics workspace.

Azure Resource ID of the existing Log Analytics Workspace where you would like the DLP and optional Function App Application Insights data to reside. The format is: "/subscriptions/xxxxxxxx-xxxxxxxx-xxxxxxxx-xxxxxxxx-xxxxxxxx/resourcegroups/xxxxxxxx/providers/microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces/xxxxxxxx"
Azure location/region of the Log Analytics Workspace referenced in the LogAnalyticsWorkspaceResourceID parameter.

Create a Sentinel scheduled query rule for each DLP policy and workload (i.e., Teams, SharePoint, Endpoint, etc.). If "false", a single scheduled query rule will be created to cover all policies and workloads.
Deploy Azure workbooks to help visualize the DLP data and manage DLP incidents.
Use the Azure Deployment Script resource to automatically deploy the Function App code. This requires the Microsoft.ContainerInstance resource provider to be registred on the subsription.
Ingest the sensitive data detected by DLP rules into Log Analytics workpace.

query.value:
//Get DLP data elements that are shared across all workloads.
let DLPCommon = PurviewDLP_CL
| where Workload in (WorkloadNames) and Operation =~ 'DLPRuleMatch'
| mv-expand PolicyDetails
| where PolicyDetails.PolicyName != ''
| mv-expand Rules = PolicyDetails.Rules
| mv-expand ActionsTaken = Rules.Actions
| mv-expand SensitiveInfo = Rules.ConditionsMatched.SensitiveInformation
| extend RulesString = tostring(Rules), SensitiveInfoString = tostring(SensitiveInfo)
| summarize ActionsTaken = make_set(ActionsTaken), arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by TimeGenerated, CreationTime, Identifier, RulesString, SensitiveInfoString
| extend SensitiveInfoType = bag_pack('Name', SensitiveInfo.SensitiveInformationTypeName, 'Count', toint(SensitiveInfo.Count), 'Confidence', toint(SensitiveInfo.Confidence))
| extend
    ActionsTaken = strcat_array(ActionsTaken, ', '),
    SensitiveInfoTypeString = strcat(SensitiveInfoType.Name, ' (', SensitiveInfoType.Count, ', ', SensitiveInfoType.Confidence, '%)'),
    PolicyName = tostring(PolicyDetails.PolicyName),
    RuleName = tostring(Rules.RuleName),
    RuleSeverity = tostring(Rules.Severity),
    UserPrincipalName = tolower(UserId),
    UserObjectId = UserKey,
    Deeplink = strcat('https://compliance.microsoft.com/datalossprevention/alerts/eventdeeplink?eventid=', Identifier, '&creationtime=', CreationTime);

//Get Sharepoint and OneDrive specific data elements from common datatable defined above.
let DLPSPOD = DLPCommon
| where Workload in ('SharePoint', 'OneDrive')
| mv-expand SensitivityLablelId = SharePointMetaData.SensitivityLablelIds
| extend SensitivityLabelId = tostring(SharePointMetaData.SensitivityLablelId)
| join kind = leftouter (_GetWatchlist('SensitivityLabels')
    | extend SensitivityLabelId = tostring(column_ifexists('id', '')),
        SensitivityLabelName = tostring(column_ifexists('name', ''))) on SensitivityLabelId
| extend OfficeObjectId = url_decode(tostring(SharePointMetaData.FilePathUrl))
| extend CreationTimeBin = bin(CreationTime, 1m)
| join kind = leftouter (OfficeActivity
    | where ingestion_time() > ago(24h)
    | where Operation == "AddedToSecureLink" or Operation == "SecureLinkUsed"
    | extend CreationTimeBin = bin(TimeGenerated, 1m),
        TargetUserOrGroupName = tolower(iff(isempty(TargetUserOrGroupName), split(UserId, "#")[1], TargetUserOrGroupName))
    ) on OfficeObjectId, CreationTimeBin
| extend Filename = tostring(SharePointMetaData.FileName),
    FilePath = tostring(SharePointMetaData.FilePathUrl),
    SiteUrl = tostring(SharePointMetaData.SiteCollectionUrl),
    ExceptionReason = tostring(SharePointMetaData.ExceptionInfo.Reason)
| summarize SensitiveInfoTypesArray = make_list(SensitiveInfoType), SensitiveInfoTypes = make_set(SensitiveInfoTypeString), TotalMatchCount = sum(toint(SensitiveInfoType.Count)), SensitivityLabels = make_list(SensitivityLabelName) by TimeGenerated, CreationTime, Identifier, Workload, Deeplink, usageLocation, UserPrincipalName, UserObjectId, department, manager, jobTitle, PolicyName, RuleName, RuleSeverity, ActionsTaken, FilePath, Filename, SiteUrl, TargetUserOrGroupName, ExceptionReason, Operation;

//Get Exchange and Teams specific data elements from common datatable defined above.
let DLPEXOT = DLPCommon
| where Workload in ('Exchange', 'MicrosoftTeams')
| extend Recipients = iff(Workload == 'Exchange', tostring(strcat(array_strcat(ExchangeMetaData.To, ', '), iff(array_length(ExchangeMetaData.CC) == 0, '', ", "), array_strcat(ExchangeMetaData.CC, ', '), iff(array_length(ExchangeMetaData.BCC) == 0, '', ", "))), tostring(strcat_array(ExchangeMetaData.To, ', '))),
    InternetMessageId = replace_string(replace_string(tostring(ExchangeMetaData.MessageID), '<', ''), '>',''),
    EmailSubject = tostring(ExchangeMetaData.Subject),
    Sender = UserPrincipalName,
    ExceptionReason = tostring(ExchangeMetaData.ExceptionInfo.Reason)
| summarize SensitiveInfoTypesArray = make_list(SensitiveInfoType), SensitiveInfoTypes = make_set(SensitiveInfoTypeString), TotalMatchCount = sum(toint(SensitiveInfoType.Count)), DetectedLocations = make_set(SensitiveInfo.Location) by TimeGenerated, CreationTime, Identifier, Workload, Deeplink, usageLocation, UserPrincipalName, UserObjectId, department, manager, jobTitle, PolicyName, RuleName, RuleSeverity, ActionsTaken, Recipients, InternetMessageId, EmailSubject, Sender, ExceptionReason, Operation;

//Define datatable so we can lookup Endpoint DLP action names from their Id.
let EndpointAction = datatable(ActionName: string, ActionId: int) [
    "None", "0",
    "Audit", "1",
    "Warn", "2",
    "WarnAndBypass", "3",
    "Block", "4",
    "Allow", "5"
];
//Array to match severity as the last word in rule name if present.
let EndpointSeverities = dynamic(['Low', 'Medium', 'High']);

//Get Endpoint specific data elements from common datatable defined above.
let DLPEndpoint = DLPCommon
| where Workload in ('Endpoint')
| mv-expand SensitiveInfo = EndpointMetaData.SensitiveInfoTypeData
| extend SensitiveInfoType = bag_pack('Name', SensitiveInfo.SensitiveInfoTypeName, 'Count', toint(SensitiveInfo.Count), 'Confidence', toint(SensitiveInfo.Confidence)),
    DeviceFullName = tostring(EndpointMetaData.DeviceName)
| extend RuleSplit = split(tostring(RuleName), ' ')
| extend RuleLength = array_length(RuleSplit)
| extend RuleSeverity = iff(RuleSplit[RuleLength - 1] in (EndpointSeverities) and EndpointSeverityInRuleName == true, RuleSplit[RuleLength - 1], '')
| extend SensitiveInfoTypeString = strcat(SensitiveInfoType.Name, ' (', SensitiveInfoType.Count, ', ', SensitiveInfoType.Confidence, '%)'),
    ActionId = toint(EndpointMetaData.EnforcementMode),
    ClientIP = tostring(EndpointMetaData.ClientIP),
    DeviceHostName = tostring(split(DeviceFullName, '.')[0]), 
    DeviceDNSName = tostring(substring(DeviceFullName, indexof(DeviceFullName, '.')+1)),
    Filename = DocumentName,
    FilePath = ObjectId,
    FileHash = tostring(EndpointMetaData.Sha256),
    FileHashAlgorithm = 'SHA256',
    RMSEncrypted = tostring(EndpointMetaData.RMSEncrypted),
    EvidenceFileUrl = tostring(EvidenceFile.FullUrl),
    SourceLocationType = tostring(EndpointMetaData.SourceLocationType), 
    EndpointOperation = tostring(EndpointMetaData.EndpointOperation),
    EndpointApplication = tostring(EndpointMetaData.Application),
    EndpointClientIp = tostring(EndpointMetaData.ClientIP)
| join kind = inner(EndpointAction) on ActionId
| extend ActionsTaken = ActionName
| summarize SensitiveInfoTypesArray = make_list(SensitiveInfoType), SensitiveInfoTypes = make_list(SensitiveInfoTypeString), TotalMatchCount = sum(toint(SensitiveInfo.Count)) by TimeGenerated, CreationTime, Identifier, Workload, Deeplink, usageLocation, UserPrincipalName, UserObjectId, department, manager, jobTitle, PolicyName, RuleName, RuleSeverity, ActionsTaken, DeviceFullName, DeviceHostName, DeviceDNSName, Filename, FilePath, FileHash, FileHashAlgorithm, RMSEncrypted, EvidenceFileUrl, SourceLocationType, EndpointOperation, EndpointApplication, EndpointClientIp, Operation;

//Merge all the SharePoint/OneDrive, Exchange/Teams, and Endpoints results together.
union DLPSPOD, DLPEXOT, DLPEndpoint
| extend FileDirectory = parse_path(FilePath).DirectoryPath
| project 
//Common attributes
TimeGenerated, CreationTime, Identifier, Workload, Deeplink, usageLocation, UserPrincipalName, UserObjectId, department, manager, jobTitle, PolicyName, RuleName, ActionsTaken, SensitiveInfoTypesArray, TotalMatchCount, 
Username = split(UserPrincipalName, '@')[0], UPNSuffix =split(UserPrincipalName, '@')[1],
RuleSeverity = iff(TotalMatchCount >= EndpointHighSeverityMatchCountTrigger and Workload == 'Endpoint' and EndpointSeverityInRuleName == false, 'High', RuleSeverity),
SensitiveInfoTypes = iff(array_length(SensitiveInfoTypes) > 1, strcat(SensitiveInfoTypes[0], ' +', array_length(SensitiveInfoTypes) - 1, ' more'), strcat_array(SensitiveInfoTypes, ', ')),
//Endpoint specific attributes
DeviceFullName, DeviceHostName, DeviceDNSName, Filename, FilePath, FileDirectory, FileHash, FileHashAlgorithm, RMSEncrypted, EvidenceFileUrl, SourceLocationType, EndpointOperation, EndpointApplication, EndpointClientIp, Operation,
//Exchange and Teams specific attributes
Recipients, InternetMessageId, EmailSubject, Sender, ExceptionReason,
//SharePoint and OneDrive specific attributes
SiteUrl, TargetUserOrGroupName,
DetectedLocations = strcat_array(DetectedLocations, ', '), SensitivityLabels = strcat_array(SensitivityLabels, ', ')
